question_sentence: Fans of legendary actress Betty White found a way to honor her on what would have been her 100th birthday. What is the #BettyWhiteChallenge?
choices: A TikTok dance to “Thank You for Being a Friend”
Donate money to any animal shelter or rescue

question_sentence: Fashion icon André Leon Talley died this week. He was the creative director for which magazine?
Which NFL team was the only one to lose at home in this year’s wild card round?
According to a new study, the Earth’s core is doing what faster than scientists previously estimated?
Which of these food-related wellness products was released this week?
choices: Oscar Mayer bologna-inspired skin care mask

question_sentence: On Wednesday, AT&T and Verizon voluntarily held off on activating 5G towers within how many miles of airports?
Tech giant Microsoft announced it will pay $68.7 billion for which video game publisher?
Cracker Barrel has been ordered to pay $9 million to a customer after the restaurant served him:
choices: Mayonnaise in place of mashed potatoes
A glass of water mixed with a cleaning chemical

question_sentence: Which of these legendary sports figures was among those who signed a letter advocating for the “Freedom to Vote Act”?
The lineup for this year’s highly-anticipated When We Were Young festival was announced this week. Which of these bands will be performing?
Which Tory MP has become the first in 15 years to defect to Labour?
evidence: Wakeford was elected as the Tory MP for Bury South in 2019 but has now defected to Labour because ‘the Conservative Party as a whole have shown themselves incapable of offering the leadership and government this country deserves’, he said

question_sentence: New Zealand has closed its doors to new arrivals in response to an increase of how much in Covid-19 cases at the border compared with December?
evidence: The decision followed a warning from Chris Bunny, head of the national quarantine system, about an ‘unprecedented number of Omicron cases coming into New Zealand’

question_sentence: Which European capital city is to undergo a makeover following a social media campaign by fed-up residents?
evidence: Mayor Anne Hidalgo announced the plan to beautify the city amid growing public anger fuelled by images of litter-strewn streets and other scenes of decay posted with the hashtag ‘#saccageparis’ (‘trashed Paris’)

question_sentence: A spoof video that has gone viral shows Boris Johnson apparently being grilled about the ‘partygate’ scandal by investigators from which popular TV show?
evidence: The clip appears to show the prime minister being questioned by Superintendent Ted Hastings (Adrian Dunbar), DI Kate Fleming (Vicky McClure) and DS Steve Arnott (Martin Compston)

question_sentence: The ex-wife of which late former football star has claimed that he haunts her home?
evidence: Alex Best told the makers of a new TV documentary series that she was ‘convinced spirits have come to visit’ her 200-year-old house in Surrey and that she believed ‘George could have been one of them’

question_sentence: Which candidate in the French presidential election has been convicted for a third time of inciting racial hatred?
evidence: The far-right former television pundit described unaccompanied migrant children as ‘thieves’, ’murderers’ and ‘rapists’

question_sentence: Investors in which trillion-dollar asset management company have been sent an open letter from chair Larry Fink calling for more shareholder democracy?
evidence: Fink wrote: ‘Stakeholder capitalism is not about politics. It is not a social or ideological agenda. It is not woke.’ Find out more with The Week Unwrapped podcast

question_sentence: China has been accused of waging a trade war on which EU country in order to test the West’s resolve to stand up to Beijing?
evidence: Lithuania’s foreign minister said Beijing was targeting the country with a ‘weapon of economic destruction’ in a row linked to Taiwanese independence that also provides an excuse for China to challenge the rules-based international order

question_sentence: Which dating app was accused of discrimination after a probe found that older users were being charged more for premium services?
evidence: According to the investigation by Which? magazine, over-50s paid an average of 46% more than under-30s for the dating app’s premium service, a difference of £23.19 per year

question_sentence: Increasing pressure from conservative activists saw how many books targeted for removal from US school libraries in 2020, according to the American Library Association?
evidence: The ALA’s Office for Intellectual Freedom said never before in 20 years ‘had this volume of challenges come in such a short time’, as right-wing campaigners demand the removal of books by authors including Margaret Atwood and Toni Morrison

question_sentence: Aid groups are still assessing the devastation of a massive volcanic eruption and tsunami that left a plume of ash blanketing which group of islands?
evidence: The islands of Tonga, home to about 100,000 people, were covered in volcanic ash after the eruption of an underwater volcano, leaving much of the region’s drinking water contaminated and many homes completely destroyed.

question_sentence: Which country has announced plans to change the name of its capital and move its location?
evidence: Indonesia approved plans to move its capital from Jakarta to Kalimantan, changing the capital’s name to Nusantara – which means “archipelago.”

question_sentence: After a nearly decade-long mission, NASA’s Curiosity rover made an exciting discovery that points to the possible existence of ancient life. What did the rover find on Mars?
evidence: A new analysis of samples collected by the rover revealed the presence of carbon – and the possible existence of ancient life on the red planet is just one potential reason why it may be there.

question_sentence: In response to a surge in Covid-19 cases, which Olympic city announced that tickets for the upcoming winter Olympic Games will not be sold to the general public?
evidence: Tickets for the upcoming Winter Olympic and Paralympic Games in Beijing will not be sold to the general public, but will instead be distributed by authorities to help control the spread of the virus.

question_sentence: The US government recently launched a website where Americans can request free at-home delivery of which item?
evidence: The Biden administration launched its website to sign up for free Covid-19 tests. COVIDtests.gov allows people to order a maximum of four tests that will be shipped directly to their households within 7 to 12 days.

question_sentence: Which celebrity, a Bronx native, pledged to pay the funeral costs for the 17 victims who died in a Bronx apartment fire earlier this month?
evidence: Rapper Cardi B plans to pay the funeral costs for those who lost their lives in the deadly fire, adding she’s “extremely proud to be from the Bronx” and “knew she needed to do something to help.”

question_sentence: The rollout of 5G technology near some airports in the US is stirring concern across the aviation industry. What are airline companies worried about?
choices: 5G signals may interfere with flight equipment
5G signals are loud and unpleasant to airport travelers
5G signals are bright and distracting to pilots
5G signals will prevent the use of onboard Wi-Fi
evidence: Executives from the nation’s largest airlines say they are concerned 5G technology near major airports will interfere with aviation technology, including radar altimeters on planes.

question_sentence: A popular fast-food chain known for “fine dining” offerings on Valentine’s Day announced they will postpone this year’s festivities due to Covid-19. Instead, they are offering socially distanced celebrations. What chain is it?
evidence: White Castle, the fast food chain known for their $1 burgers, is canceling their traditional ‘”fine dining” Valentine’s events and opting for socially distanced festivities instead.

question_sentence: What type of produce is yielding its smallest crop in the US since World War II?
evidence: Orange farmers are seeing their smallest crop in decades – a plight caused by citrus disease and bad weather, ultimately causing orange juice prices to skyrocket.

question_sentence: Which company announced plans to acquire the video game giant Activision Blizzard in a $68.7 billion deal?
evidence: Microsoft announced the purchase of the video game giant, a move that many view as a critical step in positioning Microsoft’s stake in the development of the theoretical metaverse.
